titleStmt.title: Of the nature of faith. A sermon, / by Barten Holyday, Doctor of Divinity.
titleStmt.author: Holyday, Barton, 1593-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S.G. for W. Lee, and are to be sold at his shop at the signe of the Turks Head in Fleetstreet, over against Fetter-lane end.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
